posts.post_title: F/S 3 of my rarest T207s Johnson Speaker and a brown recruit L. Carter.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick McHugh
For sale price includes fully insured fast shipping. Checks money orders and cash only. 
T207 Walter Johnson SGC 10 Napoleon back. I only know of one other. 1000
T207 Tris Speaker SGC10 Napoleon back. I only know of one other. 1000
T207 Germany Schaefer SGC A Recruit brown back. Lionel Carter collection. As far as i know there are less than 10 varified recruit brown backs I have seen 5 of them. This is the best brownest back I have seen. Even Lionel knew of this rarity and had one in his collection! 2000
 Scans are avalible. Please email me at nth15@comcast.net. These are my 3 best rarest T207s that i own after buying selling trading these the last 12 years.
